mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.area_id AS "area.id", a.name AS "name", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", o2.name AS "office.name", a3.name AS "area.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o2 ON o2.id = a.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_area a3 ON a3.id = a.area_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO busi_place( id, office_id, area_id, name, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{office.id}, #{area.id}, #{name}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE busi_place SET office_id = #{office.id}, area_id = #{area.id}, name = #{name}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
